profile.name: Nihar Patel
profile.headline: Software engineer specializing in distributed systems, cloud infrastructure, and high-throughput backend services.
profile.bio: I design and ship production-grade distributed systems, data pipelines, and cloud-native services with a focus on reliability, low latency, and clean abstractions. My work spans backend infrastructure (Go, Java, C++), cloud platforms (GCP, AWS, Kubernetes), and end-to-end product delivery with React and Next.js.

projects.title: Real-Time News Analysis and Alert Platform
projects.summary: Event-driven microservices pipeline processing 10K+ daily articles through LLM enrichment, semantic deduplication, and personalized alerting with sub-2-minute delivery latency.
highlights: Designed a Python LLM enrichment pipeline with semantic deduplication via pgvector embeddings, eliminating 60% of redundant API calls while ingesting 10K+ articles/day.
Built a Go notification service with Redis-backed caching and topic clustering, delivering preference-matched alerts to users with 70% fewer duplicates and sub-2-min end-to-end latency.
Architected an event-driven system using Kafka for stream processing, PostgreSQL for persistence, and a Next.js frontend — containerized with Docker and deployed on AWS ECS.
projects.details: A production-grade streaming platform that ingests news at scale, enriches it with LLMs, semantically deduplicates content, and triggers personalized user alerts in near real time.

projects.title: Distributed Job Orchestration Platform
projects.summary: Fault-tolerant distributed orchestrator scheduling 10K+ containerized jobs across dynamic worker nodes using a Java control plane, Go agents, gRPC, and Etcd consensus.
highlights: Engineered a fault-tolerant Java control plane with Etcd-backed consensus and consistent hashing, scheduling 10K+ jobs across a dynamic node pool while preserving availability through network partitions.
Implemented Go worker agents with Linux cgroup isolation for secure, resource-bounded container execution in production.
Instrumented Prometheus metrics and Grafana dashboards for real-time cluster health, resource utilization, and automated alerting at scale.
projects.details: A Kubernetes-inspired distributed orchestrator that centrally coordinates cluster state via Etcd while delegating lightweight container execution to edge worker agents.

projects.title: CourseBundler
projects.summary: Cloud-native learning platform on AWS with a Node.js/Express API, MongoDB + Redis caching layer, React frontend, and fully Terraform-managed ECS Fargate infrastructure.
highlights: Deployed a production-grade learning platform on AWS ECS Fargate with end-to-end Terraform IaC for repeatable, auditable infrastructure.
Built a Node.js/Express API with MongoDB persistence and a Redis caching layer, serving a React SPA frontend.
Configured ALB-based routing, CloudFront CDN distribution, and S3 static hosting for low-latency global delivery.
projects.details: A cloud-native online learning platform with a fully automated AWS deployment pipeline — ECS Fargate compute, MongoDB + Redis data tier, and Terraform-managed infrastructure.

projects.title: License Plate Detector
projects.summary: Computer vision workflow for training and running a license plate detector using a notebook-driven pipeline.
highlights: Built a reproducible notebook pipeline covering data preparation, model training, and inference for license plate detection.
Modularized the workflow into dataset prep, model training, and inference stages for clean experimentation.
Designed the pipeline to be dataset-agnostic, enabling reuse across different object detection tasks.
projects.details: A notebook-driven computer vision pipeline for license plate detection with a modular, reproducible training-to-inference workflow.

projects.title: Mental Health Treatment Prediction
projects.summary: Machine learning project that predicts likelihood of seeking mental health treatment using survey data and classification models.
highlights: Implemented an end-to-end ML pipeline — data cleaning, feature encoding, model training, and evaluation — achieving strong classification accuracy.
Conducted systematic experimentation across multiple classifiers with reproducible, documented results.
Packaged the trained model and analysis for easy sharing and reproducibility.
projects.details: A supervised learning pipeline that predicts mental health treatment likelihood from survey data using systematic feature engineering and classifier evaluation.

projects.title: PortfolioX (Mobile App)
projects.summary: React Native portfolio app with modular navigation and screens, backed by a Node.js API structured with routes, controllers, models, and middleware.
highlights: Built a cross-platform React Native app with modular screen architecture, Redux state management, and clean navigation patterns.
Developed a Node.js REST API with layered architecture — controllers, routes, models, and middleware — for maintainable backend logic.
Shipped a deployment-ready configuration with a hosted production endpoint.
projects.details: A cross-platform mobile portfolio app backed by a layered Node.js API, featuring Redux-driven state, modular navigation, and production deployment on Vercel.

projects.title: Realtime Stock Watchlist (Android)
projects.summary: Android watchlist app with real-time quotes, persistent storage, and a clean MVVM architecture.
highlights: Built real-time quote streaming with responsive Jetpack Compose UI and efficient state management via MVVM.
Implemented offline-first persistence using Room, ensuring watchlist availability without network dependency.
Structured the app with clean separation between UI, domain, and data layers for testability and maintainability.
projects.details: An offline-capable Android watchlist app with real-time stock quotes, Room-backed persistence, and a clean MVVM architecture built in Kotlin with Jetpack Compose.

experience.summary: Architected distributed Java microservices and C++ forecasting services for an investment platform on GCP, cutting deployment time by 60% and saving $2,400/mo.
highlights: Architected a distributed Java microservices backend for an investment platform using GraphQL APIs, supporting 1,000+ daily active sessions across portfolio and fund analytics workflows.
Built a multithreaded C++ stock price forecasting service running 1,000,000+ Monte Carlo iterations per run, consuming jobs via Cloud Pub/Sub and persisting forecasts to MySQL.
Migrated 15+ legacy cron-based workloads from dedicated servers to serverless Go Cloud Functions triggered by GCP Cloud Scheduler, reducing monthly infrastructure costs by $2,400.
Developed a responsive React/TypeScript dashboard with interactive Chart.js visualizations and real-time data tables.

Automated 10+ GCP services (Cloud Storage, Cloud Pub/Sub, Cloud Monitoring, etc.) via Terraform and delivered containerized services with Docker, Kubernetes (GKE), and CI/CD pipelines, cutting deployment time by 60%.

Collaborated cross-functionally to author design docs and ship reliable distributed services, owning unit and integration testing, production monitoring, and on-call debugging to sustain high service uptime.

experience.summary: Built a scalable Go order-execution microservice cutting latency by 80%, secured 220+ API endpoints with JWT auth, and automated daily ingestion of 10K+ NAV records.
highlights: Built a scalable Go order-execution microservice using Redis queues and goroutines (10 workers), cutting latency by 80%.
Architected Java multi-role access control with JWT authentication middleware, securing 220+ API endpoints.
Developed Go data pipeline syncing 10,000+ mutual fund NAV records daily from AMFI, eliminating manual entry.
Developed Java Spring Boot REST APIs and WebSockets powering a real-time portfolio dashboard.

experience.summary: Built a C++ data pipeline consuming 50K+ events/sec from Kafka, implemented Prometheus + Grafana monitoring, and achieved 3x batch throughput gains.
highlights: Built C++ data pipeline consuming 50K+ events/sec from Kafka, profiled and resolved 10+ production bugs.
Implemented Prometheus + Grafana monitoring for CPU/memory bottlenecks, reducing incident detection by 70%.
Optimized C++ batch jobs with multithreading and memory pooling, debugging leaks for 3x throughput gain.
